name: Say Cheese (Early Version)
description:
A & D, or left and right arrow keys to move

Shoot the direction you are facing with, left mouse button, x, or j

Hold W or up arrow key to shoot up

Hold S or down arrow key to shoot down

Known Bugs: No known bugs

Beta Feature:
Incremented Enemy Spawning Time introduced, it currently has no cap so after 4 minutes the spawn time will reach 0, good luck.

Planned Features:
Highscore
Leaderboard
SFX

Feedback would be greatly appreciated
